summary:
a new female NPC.
Follower, marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone, i present to you all Excell√©bet
she is coming from an xbox360 friend\'s savegame :)

She is a Nord female, 1 handed warrior, her level is player based and she is set to essential...so she won\'t die.
She is located in Dragonbridge at Four Shiel Tavern, look around there and you will find this sexy blonde beauty sitting at a table drinking or eating :)
She is wearing a Scaled Armor with no helmet, she got an ebony sword and few torches to help you see in dungeons or at night :) oh...and she is marriageable, just wear your mara amulet and talk to her :D

KNOWN ISSUE: for some strange reasons out of my noob control, there is a little face-body color mismatch. but i think it could depend on what kind of body replacer or face textures are used.
in my case, i\'m using cbbe v3.0+navetsea\'s body textures and navetsea\'s face textures.

btw, her face could be a little different on your game always depending in what body-face meshes+textures are you playing with.
Anyway, she is coming from xbox360, so if you wanna see how she originally looks like, you need a vanilla game lol

Feel free to upload you images if you like :D

----------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTALLATION:

extract the archive in your skyrim folder
(ex: c:\\\\program Files (x86)\\Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\Skyrim\\)

----------------------------------------------------------------------

REQUIRED FILES:
no strongly required files

----------------------------------------------------------------------

RACCOMENDED FILES (for a better result):

U.F.O. - Ultimate Follower Overhaul (just be sure to load excellebet.esp after U.F.O. files)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037

----------------------------------------------------------------------

thanks everyone and thanks magyaronny for creating this beauty on his xbox360 and for giving me permission to make her as a follower mod
now, Enjoy :)
author: TomAraya
